author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...DEXTER FORECAST TO BECOME A STRONG EXTRATROPICAL LOW OVER THE NORTH ATLANTIC ON THURSDAY...
summary: ...DEXTER FORECAST TO BECOME A STRONG EXTRATROPICAL LOW OVER THE NORTH ATLANTIC ON THURSDAY... As of 11:00 PM AST Wed Aug 06 the center of Dexter was located near 40.2, -54.2 with movement E at 17 mph. The minimum central pressure was 999 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...DEXTER FORECAST TO BECOME A STRONG EXTRATROPICAL LOW OVER THE NORTH ATLANTIC ON THURSDAY... As of 11:00 PM AST Wed Aug 06 the center of Dexter was located near 40.2, -54.2 with movement E at 17 mph. The minimum central pressure was 999 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Dexter (AT4/AL042025)
